name: debug
description: GDB, LLDB & Mago-MI Debugger support for VSCode

arguments.description: Arguments to append after the executable. You can also use pipes.

terminal.description: Leave this field undefined to keep program output in the vscode console at the bottom. If this is set to empty string the program will spawn in a new console using x-terminal-emulator on linux, otherwise with the specified terminal. On windows setting this to an empty string spawns the program in a console, but no other console is supported.

gdbpath.description: Path to the gdb executable or the command if in PATH

env.description: Environment overriding the gdb (and in turn also the process) environment

debugger_args.description: Additional arguments to pass to GDB

pathSubstitutions.description: Help GDB find your source using path substitutions (GDB `substitute-path)` variable

valuesFormatting.description: Set the way of showing variable values. 'disabled' - show value as is, 'parseText' - parse debuggers output text into structure, 'prettyPrinters' - enable debuggers custom pretty-printers if there are any

printCalls.description: Prints all GDB calls to the console

showDevDebugOutput.description: Prints all GDB responses to the console

autorun.description: GDB commands to run when starting to debug

stopAtEntry.description: Whether debugger should stop at application entry point

ssh.description: If this is set then the extension will connect to an ssh host and run GDB there

host.description: Remote host name/ip to connect to

password.description: Plain text password (unsafe; if possible use keyfile instead)

useAgent.description: Auto-detect the running SSH agent (via SSH_AUTH_SOCK environment variable) and use it to perform authentication

sourceFileMap.description: Mapping of source paths (from GDB on ssh remote) to local (IDE) paths.

cwd.description:
Working directory for the debugger.
If `ssh.sourceFileMap` is not set, then this is also the project path on the remote for mapping with `cwd`.

forwardX11.description: If true, the server will redirect x11 to the local host

x11port.description: Port to redirect X11 data to (by default port = display + 6000)

x11host.description: Hostname/ip to redirect X11 data to

remotex11screen.description: Screen to start the application on the remote side

bootstrap.description: Content will be executed on the SSH host before the debugger call.

target.description: PID of running program or program name or connection arguments (eg :2345) if remote is true

remote.description: If true this will connect to a gdbserver instead of attaching to a PID

valuesFormatting.description: Set the way of showing variable values. 'disabled' - show value as is, 'parseText' - parse debuggers output text into structure, 'prettyPrinters' - enable debuggers custom pretty-printers if there are any

printCalls.description: Prints all GDB calls to the console

showDevDebugOutput.description: Prints all GDB responses to the console

executable.description: Path of executable for debugging symbols

gdbpath.description: Path to the gdb executable or the command if in PATH

env.description: Environment overriding the gdb (and in turn also the process) environment

debugger_args.description: Additional arguments to pass to GDB

pathSubstitutions.description: Help GDB find your source using path substitutions (GDB `substitute-path)` variable

autorun.description: GDB commands to run when starting to debug

stopAtConnect.description: Whether debugger should stop after connecting to target

stopAtEntry.description: Whether debugger should stop at application entry point

ssh.description: If this is set then the extension will connect to an ssh host and run GDB there

host.description: Remote host name/ip to connect to

password.description: Plain text password (unsafe; if possible use keyfile instead)

useAgent.description: Auto-detect the running SSH agent (via SSH_AUTH_SOCK environment variable) and use it to perform authentication

sourceFileMap.description: Mapping of source paths (from GDB on ssh remote) to local (IDE) paths.

cwd.description:
Working directory for the debugger.
If `ssh.sourceFileMap` is not set, then this is also the project path on the remote for mapping with `cwd`.

forwardX11.description: If true, the server will redirect x11 to the local host

x11port.description: Port to redirect X11 data to (by default port = display + 6000)

x11host.description: Hostname/ip to redirect X11 data to

remotex11screen.description: Screen to start the application on the remote side

bootstrap.description: Content will be executed on the SSH host before the debugger call.

configurationSnippets.description: Connects to a gdbserver for debugging

configurationSnippets.label: GDB: Debug external embedded device
configurationSnippets.description: Debugs an embedded microcontroller supported by GDB by attaching over extended-remote
